# UIButton.Configuration.TitleAlignment.trailing

**Case**

Aligns the title and subtitle on their trailing edges.

## Declaration

```swift
case trailing
```

## Title alignments

- **UIButton.Configuration.TitleAlignment.automatic**: Aligns the title and subtitle based on other elements in the button configuration, like an image or activity indicator.
- **UIButton.Configuration.TitleAlignment.center**: Aligns the title and subtitle on their horizontal centers.
- **UIButton.Configuration.TitleAlignment.leading**: Aligns the title and subtitle on their leading edges.
